entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8 with temperature rising to 16 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low 8 with temperature rising to 16 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 23.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 23. Humidex 28. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
